title: Invisible Mouse MYSTERY TECH from WISH
description: Another stupid Wish order, another new MYSTERY TECH. We bought the tiniest phones on Wish:  Last episode of Mystery Tech!   My new podcast The Test Drivers!  Our second channel @thisis!  I stream on Twitch now!  We have a new Discord:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:
